Reproducible experiments: ROC for the four systems
--------------------------------------------------

By following the instructions above, you should be able to replicate the
exact same ROC curve:

.. figure:: roc.png
  :align: center
  :alt: ROC for the four systems
  :figclass: align-center

  ROC of MLP classifiers trained using R-Prop and L-BFGS-based trainers evaluated
  on the test set of the MNIST database of handwritten digits
